name: Captain Flamethrower Visits The Abortion Clinic (SuitsnNukes)
name_original: Captain Flamethrower Visits The Abortion Clinic (SuitsnNukes)
description: Ooh boy, just when you thought this silly little pyromaniac couldn't get sillier -- no, not in THAT building Captain Flamethrower! Why, that building is a divisive place, people have strong conflicting feelings about what goes on, dontcha' know! Ha ha j/k, burn everything in sight...
